Rulings.Tengu:
● This effect can apply either before or after the 1 manual Chain in Damage Calculation.
(it applies as soon as possible, but only once per battle).
Rulings.Goat:
●The ATK increase of “Skyscraper” is a Continuous Effect and does not start a chain.
●If “Skyscraper” is on the field and you attack a Defense Position monster with an “Elemental Hero” that has ATK lower than the ATK of the Defense Position monster, the “Elemental Hero” gains +1000 ATK even though it was attacking a Defense Position monster.
●If your opponent’s monster’s ATK is increased during the damage step, like “Injection Fairy Lily” or “Covering Fire”, your “Elemental Hero” will gain the +1000 ATK for “Skyscraper”.

Rulings.Base: 1. The ATK increase of "Skyscraper" is a Continuous Effect and does not start a chain.\n2. If "Skyscraper" is on the field and you attack a Defense Position monster with an 'Elemental HERO' that has ATK lower than the ATK of the Defense Position monster, the 'Elemental HERO' gains +1000 ATK even though it was attacking a Defense Position monster.\n3. If your opponent's monster's ATK is increased during the damage step, like "Injection Fairy Lily" or "Covering Fire", your 'Elemental HERO' will gain the +1000 ATK for "Skyscraper".

PSCT.Tengu: ① If an "Elemental HERO" monster attacks a monster with higher ATK, the attacking monster gains 1000 ATK during Damage Calculation only.
